title: Selma Blair smiles and holds arm of boyfriend David Price as they grab green juice together in LA
text:
Selma Blair flashed her cute smile Thursday while grabbing green juice with her boyfriend David Price in Los Angeles.

The 47-year-old actress donned a light blue top and grey shorts while holding David's arm as they walked.

She completed her casual outfit with white sneakers with green soles and also carried a green purse.

Scroll down for video

Juice run: Selma Blair and boyfriend David Price were spotted Thursday on a juice run in Los Angeles

David wore a pink button-up shirt untucked over a pair of blue trousers.

He finished his outfit with blue sneakers and accessorized with a watch.

David and Selma sipped their green juice together as they strolled down a sidewalk.

Selma was diagnosed in August 2018 with multiple sclerosis.

Casual style: The 47-year-old actress kept it casual in a blue top and grey shorts

She underwent chemotherapy as part of her MS treatment and lost hair that recently has been growing back.

Selma has an eight-year-old son Arthur from a previous relationship with fashion designer Jason Bleick.

The Hellboy actress has two films coming out soon.

Pumpkin patch: Selma recently took to Instagram to share a photo of her and son Arthur at a pumpkin patch in the San Fernando Valley of Los Angeles

She'll reprise her role as Carol Young in the upcoming sequel After We Collided due out in 2020.

The 2019 romantic drama After starred newcomer Josephine Langford, 22, and Hero Fiennes-Tiffin, 21, and earned $69.5 million at the worldwide box office.

Selma also will portray Dr. Doris Baxter in the crime horror film A Dark Foe currently in post-production.
description: The 47-year-old actress flashed her cute smile Thursday while grabbing green juice with her boyfriend David Price in Los Angeles.
